title: and Fertilisers Regulation Act 2023 (No. 21 of 2023)) and 11 of the Fertilisers
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the National Fertiliser Database
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the National Fertiliser Database 

Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited national fertiliser database regulation 2023

title: and Fertilisers Regulation Act 2023 (No. 21 of 2023)) and 11 of the Fertilisers
heading: 2. (1) The time or times prescribed for a person entered in the Fertiliser
text_raw:
2. (1) The time or times prescribed for a person entered in the Fertiliser 
Economic Operators’ Register to submit information to the Minister for the 
purposes of section 7D (2) of the Fertilisers Feeding Stuffs and Mineral Mixtures 
Act 1955 is: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

for a fertiliser economic operator who has brought fertiliser into 
the State, provide the information specified at section 7D (3)(a) 
other than subparagraphs (iv), and (v), no later than 72 hours after 
the fertiliser is brought into the State; 

subject to subparagraph (c), for all fertiliser economic operators, 
the details required under Section 7D (2) shall be made for each 
calendar month, the submission to be made on or before the 15th 
day of the subsequent month for which the data being submitted 
relates to; 

for all fertiliser economic operators, the details required under 
Section 7D (2) shall be made for the months of September, 
October and November 2023, the submission to be made on or 
before the 15th day of December 2023; 

for all fertiliser economic operators, the details shall be submitted 
for stocks of fertiliser products on his or her premises or under his 
or her control at 23.59 on the 30th day of September each year, 
the submission, including a nil declaration where appropriate, to 
be submitted by the 15th day of October of that year. 

(2) Subparagraphs (a), (b) and (c) of paragraph 1 apply from 1 September

title: and Fertilisers Regulation Act 2023 (No. 21 of 2023)) and 11 of the Fertilisers
and Fertilisers Regulation Act 2023 (No. 21 of 2023)) and 11 of the Fertilisers
heading: 3. (1) The time or times prescribed for a person entered in the Professional
text_raw:
3. (1) The time or times prescribed for a person entered in the Professional 
Fertiliser End Users’ Register to submit information to the Minister for the 
purposes of section 7D (6) of the Fertilisers Feeding Stuffs and Mineral Mixtures 
Act 1955 is, for all professional fertiliser end users, the details shall be submitted 
for stocks of fertiliser products on his or her premises or under his or her control 
at 23.59 on the 14th day of September each year, the information, including a nil 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th July, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [378] 3 

declaration where appropriate, to be submitted by the 15th day of October of that 
year. 

(2) The submission shall include, where relevant, the information specified 
at section 7D (7)(e)(i) of the Fertilisers Feeding Stuffs and Mineral Mixtures Act 
1955 relating to the quantity of third party fertiliser product.

title: and Fertilisers Regulation Act 2023 (No. 21 of 2023)) and 11 of the Fertilisers
heading: 4. The form and manner of a submission shall be compatible with the
text_raw:
4. The form and manner of a submission shall be compatible with the 
National Fertiliser Database as defined in section 7D (1) of the Fertilisers 
Feeding Stuffs and Mineral Mixtures Act 1955. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 July, 2023. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [378]

title: and Fertilisers Regulation Act 2023 (No. 21 of 2023)) and 11 of the Fertilisers
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations set out the reporting obligations of all Fertiliser Economic 
Operators and Professional Fertiliser End Users regarding imports into the state, 
declaration of annual closing stocks and submission of sales data.
